Encryption - Class in tools.sec
Basic class to encrypt and decode a String using DES and based on a literal key Here is an example that uses the class: try { // Create encrypter/decrypter class Encryption encrypter = new Encryption("My Pass Phrase!"); // Encrypt String encrypted = encrypter.encrypt("Don't tell anybody!"); // Decrypt String decrypted = encrypter.decrypt(encrypted); } catch (Exception e) { }
